citation.article-title: Revival of the names Spirochaeta litoralis, Spirochaeta zuelzerae and Spirochaeta aurantia.

p.s: Description of Spirochaeta zuelzerae sp. nov., nom. rev.

This species was originally described by Veldkamp (12), who named it Treponema zuelzerae; later it was renamed Spirochaeta zuelzerae (7). Type strain: ATCC 19044. The description of the type strain is identical to that of the species.
